derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: modern Latin (adopted by Linnaeus as a genus name), from Greek philadelphos 'loving one's brother'

means.word_mean: 1. any of various chiefly deciduous ornamental shrubs of the genus Philadelphus having white sweet-scented flowers, single or in clusters; widely grown in temperate regions
